attributes.background: Move Christmas bank holidays 2020 or insert additional bank Holidays in future to a time when Covid-19 restrictions permit a time we can enjoy them with friends and family.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Make June 25th. 2021 an "Australian Christmas" bank holiday: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554630

Create UK Bank Holidays on 25th and 28th June 2021 in lieu of Christmas 2020: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564183

Christmas in July - 2 extra days off on Friday 23rd and Monday 26th July 2021: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564171

Make 26th & 27th July 2021 a one off Double Bank Holiday - Christmas in July: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/561169
